visceral cavity - Have these the 
function of distending and so 
straightening the spirally coiled, very 
flexible arms of this species?
<u>Affinities of Brachiopoda <\u>
All that I have seen of the structure 
of these animals leads me to 
appreciate more <s>hi<\s> & more highly 
the value of Mr Hancocks sagacious 
suggestion that the affinities of the 
Brachiopoda are with the Polyzoa 
As in the Polyzoa the flexure of the 
intestine is <s>Neural <\s> Neural and 
they take a very natural position 
among the neural Mollusks between 
the Polyzoa on the one hand and 
the Pteropoda on the other  -
